views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 9.2 and till 12.1.2 on Last Version 3.23 of YouTube Music Application.

NoYTMusicPlaylistPanel is a Tiny Tweak that Allows to Remove the Playlist Panel on the YouTube Music Application Bottom View when Media is Playing!

No options to Configure.

See Screenshots below about How It Was Before and After.

Thanks @karimouni24 for testing.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

Happy Holidays! ðŸ¥³

Version 1.0.1
- Added Official Support for the Last Version 3.23 of YouTube Music Application.
- Added Support for arm64e/A12.
